=API for datalog.softstrat=
Usage: 
{{{
(ns <your-namespace>
  (:use clojure.contrib.datalog.softstrat))
}}}
==Public Variables and Functions==

===(_build-soft-strat-work-plan_ rs q)===

===(_get-all-relations_ ws)===
